overview:
Mr. Salona has over 25 years of professional experience in Internet/Intranet applications and information systems with clients, such as the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, Digital Equipment Corporation, Texaco Inc, Science Applications Research, and several healthcare corporations. He has led REI in the design and implementation of an innovative Electronic Handbook approach to Internet-driven information systems for complex document-driven business processes.

Mr. Salona received his M.S. in computer science from the Center for Advanced Computer Studies, the University of Southwestern Louisiana, Lafayette, in 1982. He earned a diploma for his graduate research in computer science at the Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi, India, in 1978. He received an M.S. in operations research, St. Stephen’s College, Delhi, India, in 1977.
